titles.title: Puerto Rico Inclusion Act of 2005

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow the manufacturing deduction provided by the American Jobs Creation Act of 2004 with respect to income attributable to domestic production activities in Puerto Rico.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/5/2005--Introduced. Puerto Rico Inclusion Act of 2005 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow taxpayers engaged in domestic production activities in Puerto Rico the tax deduction for income attributable to domestic production activities.
